MYSQL.CATEGORIES: CREATE TABLE CATEGORIES(CategoryCode VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (CategoryCode) )ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Categories'
MYSQL.DESTINATIONS: CREATE TABLE DESTINATIONS(DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3), PRIMARY KEY(DESTINATIONCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Destinations'; ALTER TABLE DESTINATIONS ADD CONSTRAINT DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK FOREIGN KEY DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK (COUNTRYCODE) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.ZONES: CREATE TABLE ZONES(ZONECODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, ZONENAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ZONECODE, DESTINATIONCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Zones'; ALTER TABLE ZONES ADD CONSTRAINT ZONES_DESTINATIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY ZONES_DESTINATIONS_FK (DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.HOTELS: CREATE TABLE HOTELS(HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, CATEGORYCODE VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, ZONECODE VARCHAR(8), CHAINCODE VARCHAR(5), LICENCE VARCHAR(15), LATITUDE VARCHAR(45), LONGITUDE VARCHAR(45), PRIMARY KEY (HotelCode))ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Hotels';ALTER TABLE HOTELS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTELS_CATEGORIES_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTELS_CATEGORIES_FK (CATEGORYCODE) REFERENCES CATEGORIES (CategoryCode) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE HOTELS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTELS_ZONES_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTELS_ZONES_FK (ZONECODE) REFERENCES ZONES (ZONECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.CATEGORY_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE CATEGORY_DESCRIPTIONS(CATEGORYCODE VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, CATEGORYNAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(CATEGORYCODE,LANGUAGECODE))ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Category_descriptions';ALTER TABLE CATEGORY_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT CATEGORY_DESCR_CATEGORIES_FK FOREIGN KEY CATEGORY_DESCR_CATEGORIES_FK (CATEGORYCODE) REFERENCES CATEGORIES (CATEGORYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE CATEGORY_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT CATEGORY_DESCR_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY CATEGORY_DESCR_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.HOTEL_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_DESCRIPTIONS(HotelCode varchar(8) NOT NULL, LanguageCode varchar(3) NOT NULL, HotelFacilities varchar(2000) default NULL, HotelLocationDescription varchar(2000) default NULL, HotelRoomDescription varchar(2000) default NULL, HolelSportDescription varchar(2000) default NULL, HotelMealsDescription varchar(2000) default NULL, HotelPaymentMethods varchar(2000) default NULL, HotelHowToGetThere varchar(2000) default NULL, HotelComments varchar(2000) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (HotelCode, LanguageCode) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Hotel_Descriptions'; ALTER TABLE HOTEL_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_DESCRIPTIOS_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_DESCRIPTIOS_HOTELS_FK (HotelCode) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE HOTEL_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_DESCRIPTIOS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_DESCRIPTIOS_LANGUAGES_FK (LanguageCode) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LanguageCode) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.IMAGE_TYPES: CREATE TABLE IMAGE_TYPES ( IMAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (IMAGECODE) )ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='ImageTypes'
MYSQL.HOTEL_IMAGES: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_IMAGES ( HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, IMAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, ORDER_ VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, VISUALIZATIONORDER VARCHAR(5), IMAGEPATH VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (HotelCode, IMAGECODE, ORDER_))ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Hotels_Images';ALTER TABLE HOTEL_IMAGES ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_IMAGES_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_IMAGES_HOTELS_FK (HOTELCODE) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE HOTEL_IMAGES ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_IMAGES_IMAGE_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_IMAGES_IMAGE_TYPES_FK (IMAGECODE) REFERENCES IMAGE_TYPES (IMAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS ( IMAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3), NAME VARCHAR(50) , PRIMARY KEY (IMAGECODE,LANGUAGECODE))ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='ImageDescriptions';ALTER TABLE IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS_FK(IMAGECODE) REFERENCES IMAGE_TYPES (IMAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS_FK1 FOREIGN KEY IMAGE_DESCRIPTIONS_FK1 (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.PHONE_TYPES: CREATE TABLE PHONE_TYPES(PHONETYPE VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(PHONETYPE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Phone_types'
MYSQL.PHONES: CREATE TABLE PHONES(HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, PHONETYPE VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, NUMBER_ VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE, PHONETYPE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Phones'; ALTER TABLE PHONES ADD CONSTRAINT PHONES_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY PHONES_HOTELS_FK(HOTELCODE) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE PHONES ADD CONSTRAINT PHONES_PHONE_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY PHONES_PHONE_TYPES_FK (PHONETYPE) REFERENCES PHONE_TYPES (PHONETYPE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.CONTACTS: CREATE TABLE CONTACTS(HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, ADDRESS VARCHAR(70) NOT NULL, POSTALCODE VARCHAR(10), CITY VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, EMAIL VARCHAR(100), WEB VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Contacts'; ALTER TABLE CONTACTS ADD CONSTRAINT CONTACTS_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY CONTACTS_HOTELS_FK(HOTELCODE) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE CONTACTS ADD CONSTRAINT CONTACTS_COUNTRIES_FK FOREIGN KEY CONTACTS_COUNTRIES_FK (COUNTRYCODE) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.DESTINATION_IDS: CREATE TABLE DESTINATION_IDS(DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(DESTINATIONCODE,LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='DestinationIDs'; ALTER TABLE DESTINATION_IDS ADD CONSTRAINT DESTINATION_IDS_DESTINATIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY DESTINATION_IDS_DESTINATIONS_FK (DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE DESTINATION_IDS ADD CONSTRAINT DESTINATION_IDS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY DESTINATION_IDS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.COUNTRY_IDS: CREATE TABLE COUNTRY_IDS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, SHORTNAME VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='CountryIDs'; ALTER TABLE COUNTRY_IDS ADD CONSTRAINT COUNTRY_IDS_COUNTRIES_FK FOREIGN KEY COUNTRY_IDS_COUNTRIES_FK (COUNTRYCODE) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE COUNTRY_IDS ADD CONSTRAINT COUNTRY_IDS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY COUNTRY_IDS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.HOTEL_DESTINATIONS: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_DESTINATIONS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, DESTINATIONCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='HotelDestinations'; ALTER TABLE HOTEL_DESTINATIONS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK (COUNTRYCODE) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE HOTEL_DESTINATIONS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_DESTINATIONS_DESTINATIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_DESTINATIONS_DESTINATIONS_FK (DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.CAR_DESTINATIONS: CREATE TABLE CAR_DESTINATIONS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, DESTINATIONCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='CarDestinations'; ALTER TABLE CAR_DESTINATIONS ADD CONSTRAINT CAR_DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK FOREIGN KEY CAR_DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK (COUNTRYCODE) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE CAR_DESTINATIONS ADD CONSTRAINT CAR_DESTINATIONS_DESTINATIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY CAR_DESTINATIONS_DESTINATIONS_FK (DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.TICKET_DESTINATIONS: CREATE TABLE TICKET_DESTINATIONS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, DESTINATIONCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='TicketDestinations'; ALTER TABLE TICKET_DESTINATIONS ADD CONSTRAINT TICKET_DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK FOREIGN KEY TICKET_DESTINATIONS_COUNTRIES_FK (COUNTRYCODE) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE TICKET_DESTINATIONS ADD CONSTRAINT TICKET_DESTINATIONS_DESTINATIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY TICKET_DESTINATIONS_DESTINATIONS_FK (DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.HOTEL_ISSUES: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_ISSUES (HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, ISSUEORDER VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, DATEFROM VARCHAR(21), DATETO VARCHAR(21), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, INCIDENT VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE, ISSUEORDER, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='HotelIssues'; ALTER TABLE HOTEL_ISSUES ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_ISSUES_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_ISSUES_HOTELS_FK (HOTELCODE) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE HOTEL_ISSUES ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_ISSUES_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_ISSUES_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.REGIM_BY_DEST: CREATE TABLE REGIM_BY_DEST(DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, BOARDTYPE VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(DESTINATIONCODE, BOARDTYPE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='RegimByDest'; ALTER TABLE REGIM_BY_DEST ADD CONSTRAINT REGIM_BY_DEST_DESTINATIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY REGIM_BY_DEST_DESTINATIONS_FK (DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE REGIM_BY_DEST ADD CONSTRAINT REGIM_BY_DEST_BOARD_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY REGIM_BY_DEST_BOARD_TYPES_FK (BOARDTYPE) REFERENCES BOARD_TYPES (BOARDTYPE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS(BOARDTYPE VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, SHORTNAME VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(BOARDTYPE, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='BoardDescriptions'; ALTER TABLE BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS_BOARD_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS_BOARD_TYPES_FK (BOARDTYPE) REFERENCES BOARD_TYPES (BOARDTYPE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.ROOM_TYPES: CREATE TABLE ROOM_TYPES(ROOMTYPE VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL, MINOCCUPATION VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, MAXOCCUPATION VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, STANDARDOCCUPATION VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, MAXADULTS VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, MAXCHILDREN VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ROOMTYPE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='RoomTypes';
MYSQL.ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS(ROOMTYPE VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, SHORTNAME VARCHAR(3), NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ROOMTYPE, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='RoomDescriptions'; ALTER TABLE ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS_ROOM_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS_ROOM_TYPES_FK (ROOMTYPE) REFERENCES ROOM_TYPES (ROOMTYPE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.HOTEL_TERMINALS: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_TERMINALS(HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, TERMINALCODE VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, DISTKM VARCHAR(6), DISTMIN VARCHAR(3), PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE, TERMINALCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='HotelTerminals'; ALTER TABLE HOTEL_TERMINALS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_TERMINALS_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_TERMINALS_HOTELS_FK (HOTELCODE) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE HOTEL_TERMINALS ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_TERMINALS_TERMINALS_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_TERMINALS_TERMINALS_FK (TERMINALCODE) REFERENCES TERMINALS (TERMINALCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS(CHARACTERISTICCODE VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(CHARACTERISTICCODE, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='CharacteristicDescriptions'; ALTER TABLE CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS_CHARACTERISTICS_FK FOREIGN KEY CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS_CHARACTERISTICS_FK (CHARACTERISTICCODE) REFERENCES CHARACTERISTICS (CHARACTERISTICCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.ZONE_GROUP: CREATE TABLE ZONE_GROUP(INTERFACECODE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, GROUPZONECODE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='ZoneGroup';
MYSQL.ZONE_BY_GROUP: CREATE TABLE ZONE_BY_GROUP(INTERFACECODE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, GROUPZONECODE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, ZONECODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(INTERFACECODE, GROUPZONECODE, DESTINATIONCODE, ZONECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='ZoneByGroup'; ALTER TABLE ZONE_BY_GROUP ADD CONSTRAINT ZONE_BY_GROUP_ZONES_FK FOREIGN KEY ZONE_BY_GROUP_ZONES_FK (DESTINATIONCODE,ZONECODE) REFERENCES ZONES (DESTINATIONCODE,ZONECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE; ALTER TABLE ZONE_BY_GROUP ADD CONSTRAINT ZONE_BY_GROUP_ZONE_GROUP_FK FOREIGN KEY ZONE_BY_GROUP_ZONE_GROUP_FK (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE) REFERENCES ZONE_GROUP (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS(INTERFACECODE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, GROUPZONECODE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(INTERFACECODE, GROUPZONECODE, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='ZoneGroupDescriptions'; ALTER TABLE ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS_ZONE_GROUP_FK FOREIGN KEY ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS_ZONE_GROUP_FK (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE) REFERENCES ZONE_GROUP (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES(TYPOLOGYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, TEXTFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, NUMBERFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, LOGICFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, FEEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, DISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, WALKINGDISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, TRANSPORTDISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, CARDISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, AGEFROMFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, AGETOFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, BEACHACCESSFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, BEACHAPARTFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, DYNAMICFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, CONCEPTFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(TYPOLOGYCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='FacilityTypologies';
MYSQL.FACILITY_TYPES: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_TYPES(GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, CODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, TYPOLOGYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, BASICFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(GROUP_, CODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='FacilityTypes'; ALTER TABLE FACILITY_TYPES ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITY_TYPES_FACILITY_GROUPS_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITY_TYPES_FACILITY_GROUPS_FK (GROUP_) REFERENCES FACILITY_GROUPS (GROUP_) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE FACILITY_TYPES ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITY_TYPES_FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITY_TYPES_FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES_FK (TYPOLOGYCODE) REFERENCES FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES (TYPOLOGYCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS(CODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(CODE, GROUP_, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='FacilityDescriptions'; ALTER TABLE FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS_FACILITY_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS_FACILITY_TYPES_FK (GROUP_,CODE) REFERENCES FACILITY_TYPES (GROUP_,CODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS(GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(GROUP_, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='FacilityGroupsDescriptions'; ALTER TABLE FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS_FACILITY_GROUPS_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS_FACILITY_GROUPS_FK (GROUP_) REFERENCES FACILITY_GROUPS (GROUP_) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.FACILITIES: CREATE TABLE FACILITIES(HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, CODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, ORDER_ VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, NUMBER_ VARCHAR(9), LOGIC VARCHAR(1), FEE VARCHAR(1), DISTANCE VARCHAR(9), WALKINGDISTANCE VARCHAR(9), TRANSPORTDISTANCE VARCHAR(9), CARDISTANCE VARCHAR(9), AGEFROM VARCHAR(3), AGETO VARCHAR(3), BEACHACCESS VARCHAR(1), BEACHAPART VARCHAR(1), CONCEPT VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE, CODE, GROUP_, ORDER_)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='Facilities'; ALTER TABLE FACILITIES ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITIES_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITIES_HOTELS_FK (HOTELCODE) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE FACILITIES ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITIES_FACILITY_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY FACILITIES_FACILITY_TYPES_FK (GROUP_,CODE) REFERENCES FACILITY_TYPES (GROUP_,CODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION: CREATE TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION(ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFER, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='TransferZoneDescription'; ALTER TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION ADD CONSTRAINT TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK FOREIGN KEY TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK (ZONETRANSFER) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION ADD CONSTRAINT TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE: CREATE TABLE TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE(ZONETRANSFERTERMINAL VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, TERMINALCODE VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFERTERMINAL, TERMINALCODE, ZONETRANSFER)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='TerminalTransferZone'; ALTER TABLE TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE ADD CONSTRAINT TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK FOREIGN KEY TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK (ZONETRANSFERTERMINAL) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE ADD CONSTRAINT TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK2 FOREIGN KEY TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK2 (ZONETRANSFER) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE ADD CONSTRAINT TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TERMINALS_FK FOREIGN KEY TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TERMINALS_FK (TERMINALCODE) REFERENCES TERMINALS (TERMINALCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE ADD CONSTRAINT TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_DESTINATIONS_FK FOREIGN KEY TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE_DESTINATIONS_FK (DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE(ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFER, HOTELCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='HotelTransferZone.csv'; ALTER TABLE HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK (ZONETRANSFER) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE ADD CONSTRAINT HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE_HOTELS_FK FOREIGN KEY HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE_HOTELS_FK (HOTELCODE) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.TRANSFER_ZONE_POSTAL_CODE: CREATE TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE_POSTAL_CODE(ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, POSTALCODE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFER, POSTALCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='TransferZonePostalCode.csv'; ALTER TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE_POSTAL_CODE ADD CONSTRAINT TRANSFER_ZONE_POSTAL_CODE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK FOREIGN KEY TRANSFER_ZONE_POSTAL_CODE_TRANSFER_ZONE_FK (ZONETRANSFER) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER) ON DELETE CASCADE;
MYSQL.TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION: CREATE TABLE TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION(CLASSIFICATIONCODE VARCHAR(5), PRIMARY KEY(CLASSIFICATIONCODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='TicketsClassification.csv';
MYSQL.TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC: CREATE TABLE TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC(CLASSIFICATIONCODE VARCHAR(5), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3), DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY(CLASSIFICATIONCODE, LANGUAGECODE)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_general_ci COMMENT='TicketsClassificationDescription.csv'; ALTER TABLE TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC ADD CONSTRAINT TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC_TICKETS_FK FOREIGN KEY TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC_TICKETS_FK (CLASSIFICATIONCODE) REFERENCES TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION (CLASSIFICATIONCODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;ALTER TABLE TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC ADD CONSTRAINT TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC_LANGUAGES_FK FOREIGN KEY TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC_LANGUAGES_FK (LANGUAGECODE) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE) ON DELETE CASCADE;

MSACCESS.CONTACTS: CREATE TABLE CONTACTS(HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE), ADDRESS VARCHAR(70) NOT NULL, POSTALCODE VARCHAR(10), CITY VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE), EMAIL VARCHAR(100), WEB VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE))

MSACCESS.COUNTRY_IDS: CREATE TABLE COUNTRY_IDS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), NAME VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, SHORTNAME VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, LANGUAGECODE))
MSACCESS.HOTEL_DESTINATIONS: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_DESTINATIONS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE), DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE), PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, DESTINATIONCODE))
MSACCESS.CAR_DESTINATIONS: CREATE TABLE CAR_DESTINATIONS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE), DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE), PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, DESTINATIONCODE))
MSACCESS.TICKET_DESTINATIONS: CREATE TABLE TICKET_DESTINATIONS(COUNTRYCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES COUNTRIES (COUNTRYCODE), DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE), PRIMARY KEY(COUNTRYCODE, DESTINATIONCODE))
MSACCESS.HOTEL_ISSUES: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_ISSUES ( HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE), ISSUEORDER VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, DATEFROM VARCHAR(21), DATETO VARCHAR(21), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), INCIDENT MEMO NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE, ISSUEORDER, LANGUAGECODE))
MSACCESS.BOARD_TYPES: CREATE TABLE BOARD_TYPES(BOARDTYPE VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(BOARDTYPE))
MSACCESS.REGIM_BY_DEST: CREATE TABLE REGIM_BY_DEST(DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE), BOARDTYPE VARCHAR(7) REFERENCES BOARD_TYPES (BOARDTYPE), PRIMARY KEY(DESTINATIONCODE, BOARDTYPE))
MSACCESS.BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE BOARD_DESCRIPTIONS(BOARDTYPE VARCHAR(7) REFERENCES BOARD_TYPES (BOARDTYPE), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), SHORTNAME VARCHAR(2) NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(BOARDTYPE, LANGUAGECODE))
MSACCESS.ROOM_TYPES: CREATE TABLE ROOM_TYPES(ROOMTYPE VARCHAR(7) NOT NULL, MINOCCUPATION VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, MAXOCCUPATION VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, STANDARDOCCUPATION VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, MAXADULTS VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, MAXCHILDREN VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (ROOMTYPE))
MSACCESS.ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE ROOM_DESCRIPTIONS(ROOMTYPE VARCHAR(7) REFERENCES ROOM_TYPES (ROOMTYPE), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), SHORTNAME VARCHAR(3), NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ROOMTYPE, LANGUAGECODE))
MSACCESS.TERMINALS: CREATE TABLE TERMINALS(TERMINALCODE VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL, TERMINALNAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(TERMINALCODE))
MSACCESS.HOTEL_TERMINALS: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_TERMINALS(HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE), TERMINALCODE VARCHAR(5) REFERENCES TERMINALS (TERMINALCODE), DISTKM VARCHAR(6), DISTMIN VARCHAR(3), PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE, TERMINALCODE))
MSACCESS.CHARACTERISTICS: CREATE TABLE CHARACTERISTICS(CHARACTERISTICCODE VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(CHARACTERISTICCODE))
MSACCESS.CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE CHARACTERISTIC_DESCRIPTIONS(CHARACTERISTICCODE VARCHAR(19) REFERENCES CHARACTERISTICS (CHARACTERISTICCODE), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(CHARACTERISTICCODE, LANGUAGECODE))
MSACCESS.ZONE_GROUP: CREATE TABLE ZONE_GROUP(INTERFACECODE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, GROUPZONECODE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE))
MSACCESS.ZONE_BY_GROUP: CREATE TABLE ZONE_BY_GROUP(INTERFACECODE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, GROUPZONECODE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, ZONECODE VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(INTERFACECODE, GROUPZONECODE, DESTINATIONCODE, ZONECODE)); ALTER TABLE ZONE_BY_GROUP ADD CONSTRAINT ZONE_BY_GROUP_ZONES_FK FOREIGN KEY (ZONECODE, DESTINATIONCODE) REFERENCES ZONES (ZONECODE, DESTINATIONCODE); ALTER TABLE ZONE_BY_GROUP ADD CONSTRAINT ZONE_BY_GROUP_ZONE_GROUP_FK FOREIGN KEY (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE) REFERENCES ZONE_GROUP (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE)
MSACCESS.ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS(INTERFACECODE VARCHAR(1), GROUPZONECODE VARCHAR(10), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(INTERFACECODE, GROUPZONECODE, LANGUAGECODE)); ALTER TABLE ZONE_GROUP_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT Z_GRO_DES_Z_GRO_FK FOREIGN KEY (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE) REFERENCES ZONE_GROUP (INTERFACECODE,GROUPZONECODE)
MSACCESS.FACILITY_GROUPS: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_GROUPS(GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(GROUP_))
MSACCESS.FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES(TYPOLOGYCODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, TEXTFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, NUMBERFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, LOGICFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, FEEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, DISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, WALKINGDISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, TRANSPORTDISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, CARDISTANCEFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, AGEFROMFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, AGETOFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, BEACHACCESSFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, BEACHAPARTFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, DYNAMICFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, CONCEPTFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(TYPOLOGYCODE))
MSACCESS.FACILITY_TYPES: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_TYPES(GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES FACILITY_GROUPS (GROUP_), CODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, TYPOLOGYCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES FACILITY_TYPOLOGIES (TYPOLOGYCODE), BASICFLAG VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(GROUP_, CODE))
MSACCESS.FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS(CODE VARCHAR(3), GROUP_ VARCHAR(3), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(CODE, GROUP_, LANGUAGECODE));ALTER TABLE FACILITY_DESCRIPTIONS ADD CONSTRAINT FA_DES_FA_TYP_FK FOREIGN KEY (GROUP_,CODE) REFERENCES FACILITY_TYPES (GROUP_,CODE)
MSACCESS.FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS: CREATE TABLE FACILITY_GROUPS_DESCRIPTIONS(GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES FACILITY_GROUPS (GROUP_), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(GROUP_, LANGUAGECODE))
MSACCESS.FACILITIES: CREATE TABLE FACILITIES( HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE), CODE VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, GROUP_ VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, ORDER_ VARCHAR(8) NOT NULL, NUMBER_ VARCHAR(9), LOGIC VARCHAR(1), FEE VARCHAR(1), DISTANCE VARCHAR(9), WALKINGDISTANCE VARCHAR(9), TRANSPORTDISTANCE VARCHAR(9), CARDISTANCE VARCHAR(9), AGEFROM VARCHAR(3), AGETO VARCHAR(3), BEACHACCESS VARCHAR(1), BEACHAPART VARCHAR(1), CONCEPT VARCHAR(100), PRIMARY KEY(HOTELCODE, CODE, GROUP_, ORDER_));ALTER TABLE FACILITIES ADD CONSTRAINT FACILITIES_FACILITY_TYPES_FK FOREIGN KEY (GROUP_,CODE) REFERENCES FACILITY_TYPES (GROUP_,CODE)
MSACCESS.TRANSFER_ZONE: CREATE TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE(ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFER))
MSACCESS.TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION: CREATE TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE_DESCRIPTION(ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFER, LANGUAGECODE))
MSACCESS.TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE: CREATE TABLE TERMINAL_TRANSFER_ZONE(ZONETRANSFERTERMINAL VARCHAR(19) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER), TERMINALCODE VARCHAR(5) REFERENCES TERMINALS (TERMINALCODE), ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER), DESTINATIONCODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES DESTINATIONS (DESTINATIONCODE), PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFERTERMINAL, TERMINALCODE, ZONETRANSFER))
MSACCESS.HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE: CREATE TABLE HOTEL_TRANSFER_ZONE(ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER), HOTELCODE VARCHAR(8) REFERENCES HOTELS (HOTELCODE), PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFER, HOTELCODE))
MSACCESS.TRANSFER_ZONE_POSTAL_CODE: CREATE TABLE TRANSFER_ZONE_POSTAL_CODE(ZONETRANSFER VARCHAR(19) REFERENCES TRANSFER_ZONE (ZONETRANSFER), POSTALCODE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(ZONETRANSFER, POSTALCODE))
MSACCESS.TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION: CREATE TABLE TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION(CLASSIFICATIONCODE VARCHAR(5), PRIMARY KEY(CLASSIFICATIONCODE))
MSACCESS.TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC: CREATE TABLE TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION_DESC(CLASSIFICATIONCODE VARCHAR(5) REFERENCES TICKETS_CLASSIFICATION (CLASSIFICATIONCODE), LANGUAGECODE VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES LANGUAGES (LANGUAGECODE), DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY(CLASSIFICATIONCODE, LANGUAGECODE))
